    Blockquote
    <blockquote>
  	<p>Praesent commodo cursus magna, vel scelerisque nisl consectetur et. Aenean lacinia bibendum nulla sed consectetur.</p>
  	<cite>Author</cite>
  </blockquote>

    Praesent commodo cursus magna, vel scelerisque nisl consectetur et. Aenean lacinia bibendum nulla sed consectetur.

    Author

    <input type="submit" value="submit">
    Checkbox
    Checkbox 1
    <div class="checkboxes">
    	<input id="checkbox1" type="checkbox" />
    	<label for="checkbox1">Checkbox</label>
    </div>
    Checkbox 2

    Required: ./includes/form.js in ./init-script.js (for altering Wordpress style markup to match up with example 1 so we can style the same)

    <div class="checkboxes">
    	<label><input type="checkbox" id="checkbox1a" /> Checkbox</label>
    </div>

    Intro
    <p class="intro">Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet,
  	<a href="#">consectetur adipisicing</a> elit. Aperiam enim sunt sapiente molestias, sed dicta inventore consectetur beatae asperiores, aliquid laboriosam animi, praesentium repudiandae et, quam saepe sint cupiditate reiciendis.
  </p>

    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Aperiam enim sunt sapiente molestias, sed dicta inventore consectetur beatae asperiores, aliquid laboriosam animi, praesentium repudiandae et, quam saepe sint cupiditate reiciendis.

    Lazysizes
    Iframe

    Required: 'lazysizes' in ./init-script.js Replace attribute 'src' with 'data-src'. Add the 'lazyload' class on any lazy-loading element

    <iframe frameborder="0" class="lazyload" allowfullscreen="" data-src="//www.youtube.com/embed/wgwwogGueXU"></iframe>
    Picture Src

    Required: 'lazysizes' in ./init-script.js Replace attribute 'src' and 'srcset' with 'data-src' and 'data-srcset'. Add the 'lazyload' class on any lazy-loading element

    <h3>Picture tag with multiple srcs</h3>
    <picture>
    	<source media="(min-width: 1024px)" data-srcset="images/nashbridgeslogo.jpg">
    	<img data-src="images/nashbridgeslogo-small.jpg" class="lazyload" />
    </picture>

    Picture tag with multiple srcs

    Single Src

    Required: 'lazysizes' in ./init-script.js Replace attribute 'src' with 'data-src'. Add the 'lazyload' class on any lazy-loading element

    <h3>Image tag with single src</h3>
    <img class="lazyload" data-src="images/nashbridgeslogo.jpg" />

    Image tag with single src

    Srcset

    Required: 'lazysizes' in ./init-script.js Replace attribute 'src' and 'srcset' with 'data-src' and 'data-srcset'. Add the 'lazyload' class on any lazy-loading element

    <h3>Image tag with srcset</h3>
    
    <img data-srcset="images/nashbridgeslogo-small.jpg 600w, images/nashbridgeslogo.jpg 1024w" sizes="100vw" data-src="images/nashbridgeslogo-small.jpg" class="lazyload" />

    Image tag with srcset

    Lists
    Ordered
    <ol>
    	<li>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit.</li>
    	<li>Aliquam tincidunt mauris eu risus.</li>
    	<li>Vestibulum auctor dapibus neque.</li>
    </ol>
    1. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit.
    2. Aliquam tincidunt mauris eu risus.
    3. Vestibulum auctor dapibus neque.
    Unordered
    <ul>
    	<li>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit.</li>
    	<li>Aliquam tincidunt mauris eu risus.</li>
    	<li>Vestibulum auctor dapibus neque.</li>
    </ul>
    • Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit.
    • Aliquam tincidunt mauris eu risus.
    • Vestibulum auctor dapibus neque.
    Paragraph
    <p>Aenean eu leo quam. Pellentesque ornare sem lacinia quam venenatis vestibulum. Nullam id dolor id nibh ultricies vehicula ut id elit. Nullam quis risus eget urna mollis ornare vel eu leo. Fusce dapibus, tellus ac cursus commodo, tortor mauris
  	condimentum nibh, ut fermentum massa justo sit amet risus. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Donec ullamcorper nulla non metus auctor fringilla. Donec id elit non mi porta gravida at eget metus.</p>

    Aenean eu leo quam. Pellentesque ornare sem lacinia quam venenatis vestibulum. Nullam id dolor id nibh ultricies vehicula ut id elit. Nullam quis risus eget urna mollis ornare vel eu leo. Fusce dapibus, tellus ac cursus commodo, tortor mauris condimentum nibh, ut fermentum massa justo sit amet risus. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Donec ullamcorper nulla non metus auctor fringilla. Donec id elit non mi porta gravida at eget metus.

    Radio
    Radio 1
    <div class="radios">
    	<div class="radio">
    		<input type="radio" name="groupName" id="radio1a" />
    		<label for="radio1a">Radio 1</label>
    	</div>
    	<div class="radio">
    		<input type="radio" name="groupName" id="radio2a" />
    		<label for="radio2a">Radio 2</label>
    	</div>
    </div>
    Radio 2

    Required: ./includes/form.js in ./init-script.js (for altering Wordpress style markup to match up with example 1 so we can style the same)

    <div class="radios">
    	<div class="radio">
    		<label><input type="radio" name="groupName1" id="radio1" /> Radio 1</label>
    	</div>
    	<div class="radio">
    		<label><input type="radio" name="groupName1" id="radio2" /> Radio 2</label>
    	</div>
    </div>
    Select
    <div class="selectlist">
  	<select name="" id="">
  		<option value="">Option 1</option>
  		<option value="">Option 2</option>
  		<option value="">Option 3</option>
  		<option value="">Option 4</option>
  		<option value="">Option 5</option>
  	</select>
  </div>
    Svg
    Inline as SVG tag
  <svg>
  	<use xlink:href='svg/svg-stack.svg#home'></use>
  </svg>
  
  Stack svg as background
  <img src="svg/svg-stack.svg#home" alt="svg-stack" style="width: 40px;" /> <img src="svg/svg-stack.svg#twitter" alt="svg-stack" style="width: 40px;" />
    Inline as SVG tag Stack svg as background
    Table

    Required: ./includes/table.js in ./init-script.js (for the responsive solution)

    <table class="data">
  	<thead>
  		<tr>
  			<th>Table Heading 1</th>
  			<th>Table Heading 2</th>
  			<th>Table Heading 3</th>
  		</tr>
  	</thead>
  	<tbody>
  		<tr>
  			<td>Table Cell 1</td>
  			<td>Table Cell 2</td>
  			<td>Table Cell 3</td>
  		</tr>
  		<tr>
  			<td>Table Cell 1</td>
  			<td>Table Cell 2</td>
  			<td>Table Cell 3</td>
  		</tr>
  		<tr>
  			<td>Table Cell 1</td>
  			<td>Table Cell 2</td>
  			<td>Table Cell 3</td>
  		</tr>
  		<tr>
  			<td>Table Cell 1</td>
  			<td>Table Cell 2</td>
  			<td>Table Cell 3</td>
  		</tr>
  	</tbody>
  </table>
    Table Heading 1 Table Heading 2 Table Heading 3
    Table Cell 1 Table Cell 2 Table Cell 3
    Table Cell 1 Table Cell 2 Table Cell 3
    Table Cell 1 Table Cell 2 Table Cell 3
    Table Cell 1 Table Cell 2 Table Cell 3
    Text Input
    <label for="textInput">Text input</label>
  <input type="text" id="textInput" />
